Wisdom: مَنْ تَفَكَّرَ فِي ذَاتِ اللَّهِ أَلْحَدَ
enWisdom: Whoever contemplates about the essence of Allah, apostatizes

Wisdom: مَنْ تَفَكَّرَ فِي ذَاتِ اللَّهِ تَزَنْدَقَ
enWisdom: One who reflects on the essence of Allah apostatizes

Wisdom: مَنْ تَفَكَّرَ فِي عَظَمَةِ اللَّهِ أَبْلَسَ
enWisdom: One who reflects on the majesty of Allah loses hope

Wisdom: لَمْ تَرَهُ سُبْحَانَهُ الْعُقُولُ فَتُخْبِرَ عَنْهُ بَلْ كَانَ تَعَالَى قَبْلَ الْوَاصِفِينَ بِهِ لَهُ
enWisdom: He, the Glorified, was not perceived by the intellects and thus described, rather, He, the Exalted, described himself before the describers [attempted to describe Him]
